com.carrotsearch.hppc

Class LongShortScatterMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.carrotsearch.hppc.LongShortHashMap
      • com.carrotsearch.hppc.LongShortScatterMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LongShortAssociativeContainer, LongShortMap, Preallocable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<LongShortCursor>

    @Generated(date="2017-10-22T12:19:55+0200",
           value="KTypeVTypeScatterMap.java")
public class LongShortScatterMap
extends LongShortHashMap
    Same as LongShortHashMap but does not implement per-instance key mixing strategy and uses a simpler (faster) bit distribution function.

    Note: read about important differences between hash and scatter sets.

    • Method Detail

      • hashKey

        protected int hashKey(long key)
        Description copied from class: LongShortHashMap
        Returns a hash code for the given key.

        The default implementation mixes the hash of the key with LongShortHashMap.keyMixer to differentiate hash order of keys between hash containers. Helps alleviate problems resulting from linear conflict resolution in open addressing.

        The output from this function should evenly distribute keys across the entire integer range.

        Overrides:
        hashKey in class LongShortHashMap
